text: :For the television series, see Hannah Montana Miley Ray Stewart,Hannah Montana. "I Want You to Want Me ... To Go to Florida" or Hannah Montana is a fictional character played by Miley Cyrus on the Disney Channel television show Hannah Montana. She is the main character in the series. Hannah Montana is about Miley Stewart, a teenage school girl who, at night, lives as a pop star, Hannah Montana. ==Biography== Miley Stewart is an ordinary teenager who has two lives, one as a school girl, the other as a pop star, Hannah Montana. She is from Tennessee, but now lives in California with her father Robby Ray, and brother Jackson. Robby was a singer like Miley, and now lives two lives. One as her father the as her manager and producer.Hannah Montana. "Grandma Don't Let Your Babies Grow Up to Be Favorites"Hannah Montana. "You're So Vain, You Probably Think This Zit is About You" Miley's mother died when she was young.Hannah Montana. "She's a Super Sneak" Roxy is Hannah Montana's bodyguard who protects the family, whether they want her to or not.Hannah Montana. "It's a Mannequin's World" When Miley arrives at Seaview Middle School, she meets her best friends, Lilly Truscott and Oliver Oken. Lilly finds out that Miley is Hannah Montana in the first episode, when she breaks into Hannah's dressing room. In the second episode, Oliver's crush on Hannah Montana is shown, and because of this, Miley tells him her secret. In the second season, she begins to go to her brother's high school with Lilly and Oliver.Hannah Montana. Me and Rico Down By the Schoolyard" Because of her two lives, Miley often has problems (such as sleeping in late on a school day after a concert).Hannah Montana. "New Kid in School" ==Personality== Miley's enemies are Amber Addison (Shanica Knowles) and Ashley Dewitt (Anna Maria Perez de Tagle), who are constantly mean to her and her friends, but are huge fans of Hannah Montana. Later, she gets used to her school, and meets a famous actor, Jake Ryan. She has an on and off relationship with him. Miley is famous for saying some phrases, such as "Ya think?!" whenever someone says the obvious, and "Sweet niblets!", when worried and scared. If someone says something crazy, Miley or Hannah will say something like "'Washed up ballplayer say what?'" as in Bye Bye Ball. Miley also has a stuffed bear named Beary who has been seen in many episodes. She has had Beary since she was three (as revealed in Me and Rico down by the schoolyard. Beary was destroyed in the episode "Bye Bye Ball", when Jackson was trying to kill a wasp, but Jackson was later able to fix him. ==People who know Hannah's secret== It has been shown that Miley's friends and most members of the Stewart family know that Miley is Hannah Montana. Below is the list of people mentioned in the series that know Miley's secret. * Robby Stewart (Billy Ray Cyrus), father * Susan Stewart (Brooke Shields), deceased mother * Jackson Stewart (Jason Earles), brother * Lilly Truscott (Emily Osment), best friend * Oliver Oken (Mitchel Musso), best friend"Miley Get Your Gum" * Roxy (Frances Callier), bodyguard * Jake Ryan (Cody Linley), boyfriend/close friendHannah Montana. "Achy Jakey Heart, Part 1" * Uncle Earl (David Koechner), frequently mentioned uncle * Luann Stewart (Miley Cyrus), twin mean cousin * Aunt Dolly (Dolly Parton), Godmother. * Mammaw Ruthie (Vicki Lawrence), grandmother * Bobby Ray Stewart (Billy Ray Cyrus), uncle * Fermaine (Matt Winston), Hannah's costume designer * Heather Truscott (Heather Locklear), Lilly's Mom * Jesse (Miley's boyfriend in season 4) * Siena (Jackson's girlfriend) * President Obama (Appeared in season four no showing his face) * Vita (Hannah's personal assistant) ==References== Category:Disney characters Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 2000s
